name: Conga!
description:
Have you ever conga lined with the devil in the broad daylight? You will soon… Right in this arcade conga survival game!

Lead your conga line to party all day long! Make more people join your line! Spread your Influence! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Don’t let the music stop! Please don’t let the music stop.
